author: Alastair Little
method: Cut the rhubarb into 3cm/1in lengths and mix with the sugar and vanilla.  Leave to macerate for a minimum of one hour or overnight if possible. Preheat oven to 170C/325F/ Gas 3. Lightly butter a baking dish, drain the rhubarb and pack it in. Cover tightly with foil and bake for twenty minutes.  Remove from oven and leave until cool before uncovering.
ingredients: 1 kilo/2lb 3oz forced or 'champagne' rhubarb ,  250g/8¾oz caster sugar,  1 vanilla pod, split lengthways (optional),  butter, for greasing
